LanguageData.RiceProcessing.label: Polish rice
LanguageData.RiceProcessing.description: 精米することで玄米(籾米)から白米にかえる。
LanguageData.ThreshingHusk.label: Threshing husk
LanguageData.ThreshingHusk.description: Threshing husk is the process of loosening the edible part of rice (Brown rice) from the husks and straw to which it is attached. Change from brown rice to white rice by polishing.
